error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.

Class Drupal\media_entity_smugmug\Plugin\media\Source\SmugMug was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to media_entity_smugmug.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
